S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-2041: Trigger should register a dependency on tables and columns used in its body
Add an upgrade test to verify how the dependencies are handled after upgrade and downgrade.
Skip some cross checking between getColumns() and ResultSetMetaData for views in DatabaseMetaDataTest, since those checks only pass for tables. The upgrade test case adds a view that upsets the meta-data test. (This is the first upgrade test that uses views.)
